mapper.select: select distinct m.code from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id inner join sys_role_menu rm on r.id = rm.role_id inner join sys_menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id where u.status = 1 and r.status = 1 and m.status = 1 and m.code is not null and u.id = #{userId}

select * from sys_menu
name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
and route_url like concat('%',#{routeUrl},'%')
and type = #{type}
and status = #{status}
order by sort
select * from sys_menu where status = 1 and type in (1, 2) order by sort

select distinct m.* from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id inner join sys_role_menu rm on r.id = rm.role_id inner join sys_menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id where u.status = 1 and r.status = 1 and m.status = 1 and type in (1, 2) and u.id = #{userId} order by m.sort
select distinct m.id from sys_role r inner join sys_role_menu rm on r.id = rm.role_id inner join sys_menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id where m.status = 1 and r.id = #{roleId}
